title: Morphed tweet falsely claims Amit Shah suffering from bone cancer
subtitle: Amit Shah through his official twitter account clarified that he is in a perfectly healthy condition and is not suffering from bone cancer.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
An image of a tweet supposedly tweeted by Amit Shah was shared on social media platforms claiming him to be suffering from bone cancer in the back of his throat for the past few days, and requesting people of the Muslim community to pray for his health during the good months of Ramzan. Factly found the tweet to be fake. The morphed tweet has more characters than 280 characters limit twitter allows in a single tweet. Also, as the morphed image went viral, Amit Shat through his official twitter account clarified that he is in a perfectly healthy condition and is not suffering from any illness.
